props.name: open
props.description: Marks the dialog as active which causes it to display

props.name: closable
props.description: Triggers to cause close the dialog when the 'OK' button is clicked

props.name: maskClosable
props.description: Triggers to cause close the dialog when the backdrop is clicked

props.name: transitionName
props.description:
Define the animation class name when the dialog is entering.
you can refer to Vue.js [Custom Transition Classes]

slots.name: (default)
slots.description: The default slot holds the dialog text and can contain HTML

events.name: close
events.description: Dispatched when the dialog is closed

events.name: confirm
events.description: Dispatched when the OK or Cancel button is clicked
